articles.title: In Space, No One Can Smell Your Many, Many Farts - Jalopnik
articles.description: Zero G makes America's bravest heroes fart up a storm and pee without warning.
articles.content: Becoming an astronaut is a fairly romanticized career path, but there are a lot of less-than-romantic aspects to working 50 miles or more above the Earths surface. Case in point: just being in zero G… [+2616 chars]
